data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Off on my holidays to the Carribean. As I left the plane door the smell of the diesel in the air is a sign that I was about to have fun. Off on the roads and watching the numerous mopeds speeding along. They are zigzagging in and out of traffic and pedestrians. No wonder there are lots of petrol patches on the roads from accidents. Oh my!! These cases are heavy, good job I went to the gym to pump up my muscles.
data.original_output: Off on my holidays to the Carribean. As i left the plane door the smell of the diesel in the air is a sign that I was about to have fun. Off on the roads and watching the numerous mopeds speeding along. they are zigzagging in and out of traffic and pedestrians. No wonder there are lots of petrol patches on the roads from accidents. Oh my!! these cases are heavy, good job  I went to the gym to pump up my muscles.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Yesterday I received a letter in the post. As I pulled it out of the letterbox I jumped back. A large spider had come in with it. In order to avoid it running up my leg I was hopping about and also trying not to stamp on it. In the end I opened the door and it moved to the step. I used the sweeping brush to help send it on its way.
data.original_output: yesterday i received a letter in the post . As i pulled it out of the letterbox I jumped back. A large spider had come in with it. In order to avoid it running up my leg I was hopping about and also trying not to stamp on it. In the end I opened the door and it moved to the step. I used the sweeping brush to help send it on its way.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: I was privileged to attend a big show last week. There was a man playing the organ. Apparently he started with one and then bought a store. He started his own company and now has grown to a million pound empire. As it was so entertaining I found it hard to comply with the rules and not start singing and clapping.
data.original_output: I was privalidged to attend a big show last week. There was a man playing the organ. Apparently he started with one and then bought a store . He started his own company and now has grown to a milion pound empire. As it was so entertaining i found it hard to comply with the rules and not start singing and clapping.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: Walking through the park on a lovely summers day, I was feeling really happy now that the debt that I had gotten into did not exist any longer. After winning the lottery on saturday I was able to make the final payment on it. This action immediately lifted me out of the doom and gloom mood I had been living in.

After winning the lottery on saturday i was able to make the final payment on it. This action immedietely lifted me out of the doom and gloom mood I had been living in .
